column4: Hey guys, can I find a good laptop that'll run ubuntu smoothly for under $400?
I run Ubuntu Desktop on my netbook just fine.  Maybe specify what you mean by smoothly?
I just mean, run it with no prob
To give you perspective, I have one of the earlier N270 Atom netbooks with a 1GB of RAM.  It runs Ubuntu just fine; I can even play Minecraft on this thing.
